1111310435997741057.text: And the rise of stupidity as acceptable to the detriment of facts and science..https://twitter.com/neiltyson/status/1111295662920888320 …

1111312400664485890.text: I want to shake people by the shoulders and say "is a globe flat?" No? Ok there is your damn answer.

1111323341019856896.text: Yes, I am currently battling my son's eighth grade science exploratory teacher and her teaching the kids that rest is more powerful than vaccines to give immunity against disease. I am so frustrated.

1111324956837793793.text: If the earth is flat, I'd like to see the edge, and the edge of a cliff doesn't count...  The earth is not frickin flat people...

1111397420569640962.text: I don’t understand flat-earthers in the same way I do not understand creationists. But... truly, is the earth was flat then the sun would not rise and fall. I just... (Sighs)pic.twitter.com/6lMoKIIiJp
